mapper.select: SELECT spec_item_id AS 'specItemId', spec_id AS 'specId', item FROM mtmydb.mtmy_spec_item t WHERE spec_id = #{specId}
SELECT s.name AS 'specName', i.item AS 'item' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_spec_item i LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_spec s ON s.spec_id = i.spec_id WHERE i.spec_item_id = #{specItemId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM mtmydb.mtmy_spec_item WHERE spec_id = #{specId} AND spec_item_id = #{specItemId}
